synopsis.text: Twitter's official Mahoutsukai no Yome account unveiled a charming '#0 Aisatsu' episode from the Maho Yome anime shorts series this past Tuesday. The delightful clip features a friendly debate among Chise, Elias, and Ruth as they determine who will take the lead in presenting the anime. Ultimately, Chise steps up to introduce the captivating series. In tandem with the weekly release of new television anime episodes, fans can look forward to enjoying a fresh 30-second Maho Yome short on Twitter every Tuesday. Keep in mind, once a new episode premieres, the previous one will no longer be available to view.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
